What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy live in the mountains, under the impregnable dome called Bancroft. They possess all the best food, brilliant architecture, and breakthrough medical advancements that might save the world, and they want nothing more than to stay. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film.
